column5: planning a trip to lady evelyn,any info would be appreciated.any body interested?prefer camping but would also go to a lodge.

Highly suggest the Garden Island Lodge. Joe runs a good camp. Took my son there last year. They have a white board to record your Keepers at the dock. If you catch large enough fish, he gives you a plaque. I earned 1 for a 29" walleye. That part of the lake is typical Canadian Shield.
